



;BG SPRITES
; width(px) rounded up
;.db vram data mask, color data....

testBGSprite:
	.db 10
	.db $00,$35,$FF,$00,$F0,$03,$0F,$50,$F0,$05
	.db $FF,$00,$FF,$00,$FF,$00,$00,$23,$F0,$03
	.db $00,$22,$00,$22,$00,$33,$0F,$30,$F0,$02
	.db $00,$35,$FF,$00,$F0,$03,$0F,$05,$F0,$05
	.db $FF,$00,$FF,$00,$FF,$00,$00,$23,$F0,$03
	.db $00,$22,$00,$22,$00,$33,$0F,$30,$F0,$02
	.db $00,$35,$FF,$00,$F0,$03,$0F,$05,$F0,$05
	.db $FF,$00,$FF,$00,$FF,$00,$00,$23,$F0,$03	
;53xx3xx55
;xxxxxx323
;222233x32
;53xx3xx55
;xxxxxx323	
;222233x32


	
;FG _ SPRITES

;YBRGW

;SLOW_Sprite,  even pixel start
;.height
;.num loops per num lines

;.db alpha length(gap between single pixels, 0 for a gap of -1, 1 for no gap),single pixel mask(%00001111) or (%11111111) single pixel data (%data0000) or (%00000000),
; ldir length, main pixel data,pixel mask,pixel data.....

testSlowSprite:
	.db 5
	.db 2,4,7,11,12
	.db 0,%11111111,%00000000,2,$35,$35,%11111111,%00000000,0,%11111111,%00000000,2,$24,$24,%11111111,%00000000
	.db 155, %11111111,%00000000,2,$31,$31,%11110000,$01,1,%11111111,%00000000,1,$11,%11111111,%00000000
	.db 154,%00001111,$50,1,$53,%11111111,%00000000,0,%11111111,%00000000,1,$35,%11110000,$05,1,%00001111,$50,0,%11111111,%00000000
	.db 154,%00001111,$30,0,%11110000,$03,0,%11111111,%00000000,0,%11110000,$03,1,%00001111,$30,0,%1111111,00000000,0,%00001111,$30,0,%11111111,%00000000
	.db 155,%00001111,$50,4,$55,$55,$55,$55,%11110000,$05
	
	;WRWRXXGBGBXX
	
	;XXYRYRYXXXYY
	
	;XW RW XX WR WX XW
	
	;XR RX RX XR XR XX
	
	;XW WW WW WW WW WX
	
	
testSlowSpriteBestCase:
	.db 5
	.db 1,2,3,4,5
	.db 0,%00001111,$50,4,$55,$55,$55,$55,%11110000,$05
	.db 155,%00001111,$50,4,$55,$55,$55,$55,%11110000,$05
	.db 155,%00001111,$50,4,$55,$55,$55,$55,%11110000,$05
	.db 155,%00001111,$50,4,$55,$55,$55,$55,%11110000,$05
	.db 155,%00001111,$50,4,$55,$55,$55,$55,%11110000,$05
	
;XW WW WW WW WW WX
;XW WW WW WW WW WX
;XW WW WW WW WW WX
;XW WW WW WW WW WX
;XW WW WW WW WW WX

;YBRGW

;.db flags ( 4bpc,3bpc,2bpc,1bpc,0bpc,noalpha
;.db width(px),height
;.db alpha data 
;.db color data

	
testSpriteCompressed:
	.db %10000000;4bpc
	.db 8,8
;.db $33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22
	.db %01111110;1
	.db %01100110;2
	.db %11001110;2
	.db %01010101;2
	.db %10101010;2
	.db %01101110;2
	.db %00111011;2
	.db %01100111;2
	.db $53,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55,$11,$22,$33,$55;indexed color data
	;1 3 5 7 9 11 13 15
	

testSpriteCompressed4:
	.db %01000000;3bpc
	.db 9,4
	.db %10011101,%01011111,%11110110,%10000010,%10110000
	.db $54,$32,$10,$33
	.db %11100011,%10001110,%00111000,%11100011,%10001110,%00111000,%11100011,%10001110,%00111000,%11100011,%11100011,%10001110,%00111000,%11100011,%10001110,%00111000,%11100011,%10001110,%00111000,%11100011
;100111010  2 loop
;101111111  1 loop
;110110100  2 loop
;000101011  2 loop
;2357
testSpriteCompressedFast:
	.db %00100000;4bpc
	.db 8,8
	.db %11110000
	.db %00110011
	.db %11000011
	.db %11111111
	.db %11110011
	.db %11001100
	.db %11000000
	.db %00111111
	.db $54,$32
	.db %11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001,%11001001
	.db $55,$44,$33,$22,$55,$44,$33,$22,$55,$44,$33,$22,$55,$44,$33,$22,$55,$44,$33,$22,$55,$44,$33,$22,$55,$44,$33,$22,$55,$44,$33,$22,$55,$44,$33,$22
	
	
	
testBGSpriteComp:
	.db %00100100;2bpc noalpha
	.db 8,8;8 wide 
	.db $23,$45;brgw
	.db %00000000,%00000000,%01010101,%01010101,%10101010,%10101010,%11111111,%11111111
	.db %00000000,%01010101,%01010101,%00000000,%00000000,%10101010,%10101010,%00000000
	
	
testBGSpriteComp2:
	.db %00100100;2bpc noalpha
	.db 6,6;
	.db $23,$45;brgw
	.db %00000000,%00000101,%01010101,%10101010,%10101111,%11111111
	.db %00000000,%00000101,%01010101
	
testBGSpriteComp3:
	.db %00100100;2bpc noalpha
	.db 6,1;
	.db $23,$45;brgw
	.db %00000000,%00000000

testBGSpriteComp4:
	.db %00001000;0bpc alpha 
	.db 7,4
	.db %11101010,%00011101,%11010010,%01100000
	.db $20
	
;BBBXBXB
;XXXXBBB
;XBBBXBX
;XBXXBBX	
	
;FAST_SPRITE	
;double pixel transparency, no gaps
;.db height
;.db num loops for num lines
;.db to next ldir start, color length, data

test_fast_sprite:;20x4px,complex
	.db 4
	.db 2,6,7,9
	.db 2,2,%00010010,%01000101,3,4,%00110011,%00110010,%01000101,%01000100 ;gap, length,    						XXBYWGXXXXXXRRBRWGGG
	.db 151,2,%00100001,%00100001,1,2,%00110101,%00110101,1,1,%01000011,1,1,%00110101; 								XXYBYBXXWRWRXXRGXXWR
	.db 150,10,%00110101,%00110101,%01000101,%01000101,%00010010,%00010010,%00110100,%00110100,%00110100,%00110100; WRWRWGWGBYBYGRGRGRGR
	.db 152,5,%01010101,%00010001,%00100010,%00110011,%01000100,1,2,%01000100,%01010011;							XXXXWWYYBBRRGGXXGGRW



;COMPLEX_SPRITE
;16 color, per pixel transparency, even or odd start


test_unity_compressed_1:
.db %00100000
.db 32, 32
.db %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111
.db %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111
.db %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111, %11111111
.db %11001100, %11001100, %11001100, %11001100, %01000100, %01000100, %01000100, %01000100
.db %10001000, %10001000, %10001000, %10001000, %10000000, %10000000, %10000000, %10000000
.db %11011011, %01101101, %10110110, %11011011, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010
.db %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010
.db %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %10111101, %11001110, %11110111, %00110111
.db %00011001, %10011000, %01111011, %11011111, %11100101, %00110011, %01000100, %10000100
.db %10110001, %01100100, %00011001, %00111111, %00000111, %11001111, %10111100, %01111000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000

.db %00110001, %00100000

.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101
.db %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101
.db %01010101, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10101010, %10100101, %01010101
.db %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101
.db %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010101, %01010000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
.db %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000, %00000000
